public class  BrowserPanel
     extends java.awt.Panel
{

     DiskObject diskObject;

     int lgIconH;
     int lgIconW;
     int[] smIconData;
     int smIconH;
     int smIconW;
     int which;

          // Constructors 1
     public BrowserPanel(int);

          // Methods 13
     String diskVolumeFlagsToString(int);
     private String getDateString(DiskFile);
     public DiskObject getDiskObject();
     private String getFinderInfoString(DiskFile);
     public void paint(Graphics);
     public Dimension preferredSize();
     public void setDiskObject(DiskObject);
     void showDiskAliasStrings(Graphics, int, int);
     void showDiskFileStrings(Graphics, int, int);
     void showDiskInformation(Graphics);
     void showDiskVolumeStrings(Graphics, int, int);
     void showLargeIcon(Graphics, int, int);
     void showSmallIcon(Graphics, int, int);
}

Used by the DiskBrowser class. Displays information about a file, alias, directory, or volume. The disk object being displayed is set and retrieved by the BrowserFrame which contains this panel. Feel free to modify this file as you wish.

Author:
